author: Reuters Editorial
title: Timkensteel Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.04
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - TimkenSteel Corp:
* TIMKENSTEEL ANNOUNCES FIRST-QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; EXPECTS CONTINUED IMPROVEMENT IN SECOND QUARTER
* Q1 SALES $380.8 MILLION VERSUS $309.4 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 SHIPMENTS ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 5 PERCENT AND 10 PERCENT HIGHER THAN FIRST-QUARTER 2018
* QTRLY SHIP TONS WERE APPROXIMATELY 300,000, AN INCREASE OF 7.1 PERCENT OVER Q1 OF 2017
* SEES Q2 NET INCOME IS PROJECTED TO BE BETWEEN $8 MILLION AND $18 MILLION
* 2018 CAPITAL SPENDING IS PROJECTED TO BE $40 MILLION * Q2 SHIPMENTS ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 5 PERCENT AND 10 PERCENT HIGHER THAN FIRST-QUARTER 2018 FROM IMPROVING END MARKETS Source text for Eikon:
